cui_name: Malignant tumor of extrahepatic bile duct
reasoning: Extrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma incidence ~0.8-1.0 per 100k from GLOBOCAN and WHO data, accounting for approximately 30-40% of all cholangiocarcinoma cases. Global incidence with significant geographic variation, higher in Southeast Asia due to parasitic infections (opisthorchiasis).
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC) estimates for bile duct cancer
